channel.title: Hyperion Compiler doesnt work
channel.description:
I want to use hyperion instead of all the other bases, but i dont want to use eclipse. I found a base that comes with a javac compiler, but whenever i compile, i get this error:

This is what my compiler is right now: @echo off java -jar lib/javac++.jar src lib bin pause
So if someone can help me plz reply.

item.title: Hyperion Compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @V_I_B_E V I B E
item.description:
@V_I_B_E wrote:

I want to use hyperion instead of all the other bases, but i dont want to use eclipse. I found a base that comes with a javac compiler, but whenever i compile, i get this error:
